entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 32 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
